ingredients: 1  ripe pear - peeled, cored, and chopped,   +   1/2 cup white wine, 1 clove garlic, chopped, 2 teaspoons Dijon mustard,   +   1/4 cup white balsamic vinegar, 1 teaspoon ground black pepper,   +   1/4 teaspoon sea salt,   +   1/2 cup olive oil
nutrition: Total Fat 9g 12%, Saturated Fat 1g 6%, Sodium 60mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 4g 1%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 2g, Protein 0g, Vitamin C 1mg 4%, Calcium 5mg 0%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 31mg 1%
